      • putImage

        public void putImage(String path,
            int x,
            int y,
            int w,
            int h,
            Graphics2D graphics)
        The portrayal of the current device can draw a geometric figure or print a predefine image. This method is called when the device has been linked to be draw as an image.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the file that contains the image.
        x - the X position coordinate.
        y - the Y position coordinate.
        w - the wide of the portrayal.
        h - the height of the portrayal.
        graphics - the graphics object to draw the image on.
